requirements.text: Vendor must provide 50 single occupancy rooms for 5 nights (Sep 10-15).
Hotel must be within 2 miles of the Convention Center.
Breakfast must be included in the room rate (Federal Per Diem compliant).
Conference room "Alpha" must seat 100 people in classroom style.
Main conference room requires 2 projectors, 2 screens, and 4 wireless microphones.
Vendor must accept government purchase card (GPC) for payments under $10,000.
Cancellation policy must allow full refund up to 72 hours prior to arrival.
High-speed wireless internet access required in all meeting spaces and guest rooms.

fit_assessment.summary: Excellent fit based on mock analysis. All requirements appear to be met.
